alert.title: It's time to choose something new
alert.body: Your bag has been reset and you're ready to reserve your next order

alert.title: Want to swap your items?
alert.body: Pack up any items you wish to swap, attach the pre-paid label, and drop off at a nearby UPS pick-up location

alert.title: You're In
alert.body: You've been invited to complete your sign up and reserve your first order

alert.title: You've been featured!
alert.body: Your fit pic has been approved and is officially live. Tap to see it in the app.

alert.title: Your saved item is back in-stock
